location.zh-cn: 重庆市 (中华民国)，西昌县

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国防部在中国西南地区的派出机关，直属于行政院，于1949年5月1日成立，1950年3月在西昌战役失败后溃散。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China in Southwest China, directly subordinate to the Executive Yuan. It was established on May 1, 1949, and disintegrated after its defeat in the Xichang Campaign in March 1950.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国防事务主管机构，西南军政长官公署为其派出机关。
description.en: The defense affairs authority of the Republic of China. The Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office was its dispatched agency.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高行政机关，西南军政长官公署直属于该机构。
description.en: The highest administrative body of the Republic of China, to which the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office was directly subordinate.

description.zh-cn: 1950年3月由中国人民解放军发起的战役，导致了西南军政长官公署的最终溃散。
description.en: A military campaign launched by the People's Liberation Army in March 1950, which led to the final collapse of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾担任西南军政长官公署长官、重庆绥靖公署主任等职。
description.en: A political figure of the Republic of China, who served as the Administrator of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office and Director of the Chongqing Pacification Area Command.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，于1949年12月被任命为西南军政长官公署长官。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, appointed as the Administrator of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office in December 1949.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，曾任西南军政长官公署副长官、代长官，以及川陕甘边区绥靖公署主任。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, who served as Deputy Administrator and Acting Administrator of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office, and Director of the Sichuan-Shaanxi-Gansu Border Area Pacification Command.

description.zh-cn: 西南军政长官公署的前身，由重庆行辕于1948年3月改组而成。
description.en: The predecessor to the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office, reorganized from the Chongqing Field Headquarters in March 1948.

nodes.id: 国民政府主席重庆行辕

zh-cn: 国民政府主席重庆行辕

description.zh-cn: 重庆绥靖公署的前身，由国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营改组而成。
description.en: The predecessor to the Chongqing Pacification Area Command, reorganized from the Chongqing Field Headquarters of the Chairman of the National Government Military Affairs Commission.

nodes.id: 国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营

zh-cn: 国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营

description.zh-cn: 国民政府主席重庆行辕的前身，于1946年5月由军事委员会成都行辕和陆军总部部分人员合并组成。
description.en: The predecessor to the Chongqing Field Headquarters of the Chairman of the National Government, formed in May 1946 by merging personnel from the Chengdu Field Headquarters of the Military Affairs Commission and the Army General Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 国民政府军事委员会在成都的派出机构，其部分人员于1946年5月参与组建了国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营。
description.en: A dispatched agency of the National Government Military Affairs Commission in Chengdu, whose personnel participated in forming the Chongqing Field Headquarters of the Chairman of the National Government Military Affairs Commission in May 1946.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军的最高指挥机构，其部分人员于1946年5月参与组建了国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营。
description.en: The highest command body of the Republic of China Army, whose personnel participated in forming the Chongqing Field Headquarters of the Chairman of the National Government Military Affairs Commission in May 1946.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量，其西南军区部队发起了西昌战役。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China, whose Southwest Military Region forces launched the Xichang Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在西南地区的军事指挥机构，发起了西昌战役。
description.en: The military command structure of the People's Liberation Army in the Southwest region, which initiated the Xichang Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国总统，对西南军政长官公署的人事任命有决定权。
description.en: President of the Republic of China, who had decision-making power over personnel appointments for the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，在西南军政长官公署及其前身机构中长期担任参谋长职务。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who served for a long time as Chief of Staff in the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office and its predecessor organizations.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，曾任西南军政长官公署副长官及西昌警备总司令部总司令。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who served as Deputy Administrator of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office and Commander-in-Chief of the Xichang Garrison Command.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，曾任西南军政长官公署副长官及西南第二路游击总司令。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who served as Deputy Administrator of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office and Commander-in-Chief of the Southwest Second Route Guerrilla.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，曾任西南军政长官公署副长官及川鄂绥靖公署主任。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who served as Deputy Administrator of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office and Director of the Sichuan-Hubei Pacification Command.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于西南军政长官公署的军事机构，由胡宗南担任主任。
description.en: A military body subordinate to the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office, directed by Hu Zongnan.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于西南军政长官公署的军事机构，由孙震担任主任。
description.en: A military body subordinate to the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office, directed by Sun Zhen.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于西南军政长官公署的军事机构，由谷正伦担任主任。
description.en: A military body subordinate to the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office, directed by Gu Zhenglun.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治及军事人物，曾任贵州绥靖公署主任。
description.en: A political and military figure of the Republic of China who served as Director of the Guizhou Pacification Command.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于西南军政长官公署的军事机构，由卢汉担任主任。
description.en: A military body subordinate to the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office, directed by Lu Han.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，滇军高级将领，曾任云南绥靖公署主任。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China, a high-ranking general of the Yunnan Army, who served as Director of the Yunnan Pacification Command.

description.zh-cn: 隶属于西南军政长官公署的军事机构，由宋希濂担任主任。
description.en: A military body subordinate to the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office, directed by Song Xilian.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，曾任川湘鄂边区绥靖公署主任。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who served as Director of the Sichuan-Hunan-Hubei Border Area Pacification Command.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的一支部队，在西昌战役中攻占了西昌县城。
description.en: A unit of the People's Liberation Army that captured Xichang County seat during the Xichang Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 位于四川省的城市，西南军政长官公署后期所在地，于1950年3月27日被解放军攻占。
description.en: A city in Sichuan Province, the later location of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office, captured by the PLA on March 27, 1950.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政府在华中地区的军政机构，于1950年3月27日与西南军政长官公署一同被撤销。
description.en: The military and political administration of the Republic of China government in Central China, which was abolished along with the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office on March 27, 1950.

description.zh-cn: 西南军政长官公署直隶于行政院。
description.en: The Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office was directly subordinate to the Executive Yuan.

description.zh-cn: 西南军政长官公署是中华民国国防部在中国西南地区的派出机关。
description.en: The Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office was a dispatched agency of the Ministry of National Defense of the Republic of China in Southwest China.

description.zh-cn: 1949年5月，重庆绥靖公署改称为西南军政长官公署。
description.en: In May 1949, the Chongqing Pacification Area Command was renamed the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office.

relationships.source: 国民政府主席重庆行辕

description.zh-cn: 1948年3月，因蒋介石就任总统，重庆行辕改为重庆绥靖公署。
description.en: In March 1948, following Chiang Kai-shek's inauguration as president, the Chongqing Field Headquarters was changed to the Chongqing Pacification Area Command.

relationships.source: 国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营
relationships.target: 国民政府主席重庆行辕

description.zh-cn: 国防部成立后，重庆行营改为国民政府主席重庆行辕。
description.en: After the establishment of the Ministry of National Defense, the Chongqing Field Headquarters was changed to the Chongqing Field Headquarters of the Chairman of the National Government.

relationships.target: 国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营

description.zh-cn: 国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营由原军事委员会成都行辕和陆军总部部分人员合并组成。
description.en: The Chongqing Field Headquarters of the Chairman of the National Government Military Affairs Commission was formed by merging personnel from the former Chengdu Field Headquarters of the Military Affairs Commission and the Army General Headquarters.

relationships.target: 国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营

description.zh-cn: 国民政府军事委员会委员长重庆行营由原军事委员会成都行辕和陆军总部部分人员合并组成。
description.en: The Chongqing Field Headquarters of the Chairman of the National Government Military Affairs Commission was formed by merging personnel from the former Chengdu Field Headquarters of the Military Affairs Commission and the Army General Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 西南军政长官公署在西昌战役中失败而溃散，并于1950年3月27日被撤销。
description.en: The Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office was defeated and disintegrated during the Xichang Campaign, and was abolished on March 27, 1950.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军西南军区发起了西昌战役。
description.en: The Southwest Military Region of the People's Liberation Army launched the Xichang Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军第15军于1950年3月27日攻占西昌县城。
description.en: The 15th Corps of the People's Liberation Army captured Xichang County seat on March 27, 1950.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石于1949年12月7日改派顾祝同为西南军政长官。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek re-appointed Gu Zhutong as the Southwest Military and Political Administrator on December 7, 1949.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石于1949年12月7日任命胡宗南为西南军政长官公署副长官兼参谋长。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek appointed Hu Zongnan as the Deputy Administrator and Chief of Staff of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office on December 7, 1949.

position.zh-cn: 副长官兼参谋长，后代理长官
position.en: Deputy Administrator and Chief of Staff, later Acting Administrator

description.zh-cn: 川陕甘边区绥靖公署是西南军政长官公署的下辖机构。
description.en: The Sichuan-Shaanxi-Gansu Border Area Pacification Command was a subordinate agency of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office.

description.zh-cn: 川鄂绥靖公署是西南军政长官公署的下辖机构。
description.en: The Sichuan-Hubei Pacification Command was a subordinate agency of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office.

description.zh-cn: 贵州绥靖公署是西南军政长官公署的下辖机构。
description.en: The Guizhou Pacification Command was a subordinate agency of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office.

description.zh-cn: 云南绥靖公署是西南军政长官公署的下辖机构。
description.en: The Yunnan Pacification Command was a subordinate agency of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office.

description.zh-cn: 川湘鄂边区绥靖公署是西南军政长官公署的下辖机构。
description.en: The Sichuan-Hunan-Hubei Border Area Pacification Command was a subordinate agency of the Southwest Military and Political Administrator's Office.

description.zh-cn: 随着解放军在西昌战役中逼近，代理长官胡宗南于3月26日晚乘飞机离开西昌。
description.en: As the PLA closed in during the Xichang Campaign, Acting Administrator Hu Zongnan fled Xichang by plane on the night of March 26.

description.zh-cn: 随着解放军在西昌战役中逼近，副长官贺国光于3月26日晚乘飞机离开西昌。
description.en: As the PLA closed in during the Xichang Campaign, Deputy Administrator He Guoguang fled Xichang by plane on the night of March 26.
